contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of September, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the case is REMANDED to the Superior Court to reconsider in light of our opinion in Commonwealth v. Wallace, 626 Pa. 362, 97 A.3d 310 (2014), currently available at 2014 WL 3579692.
